Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with a band of tongues. The shoulder is decorated with a myrtle-wreath in relief. At the rear is an Egyptian ring handle. Within the multiple base-ring is an impressed letter I. Traces of an orange slip remain.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2072)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs W N Weech
